pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![pre-commit.ci status](https://results.pre-commit.ci/badge/github/funcx-faas/funcx-common/main.svg)](https://results.pre-commit.ci/latest/github/funcx-faas/funcx-common/main)# globus-compute-commonThis package contains common utilities for use across various Globus Compute projects.For example, constants shared between the Globus Compute Web Service and the SDK aredefined here (and may be re-exported by the SDK).
